title: Kotlin Multiplatform Complete Course
description: Master Kotlin Multiplatform from basics to production with Kotlin 2.3 and the K2 compiler. Build Android and iOS apps with shared code using Compose Multiplatform 1.10. Covers Ktor 3.4 backend development, functional programming with Arrow, coroutines, SQLDelight persistence, and the full KMP stack. 128 lessons across 15 modules with 80+ coding challenges.
